mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.user_name , u."password" , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.user_info_id , aut."name" as "authority_name" , aut."id" as "authority_id" , us_info.first_name , us_info.last_name , us_info.gender , us_info.date_birth , us_info.phone , us_info."desc" , us_info.status , us_info.resource_id , u_role."id" as "role_id" , u_role."role" as "role" FROM role_authority r_aut INNER JOIN user_ u on u.role_id = r_aut.role_id INNER JOIN authority aut on aut."id" = r_aut.authority_id INNER JOIN user_info us_info on us_info.id = u.user_info_id INNER JOIN user_role u_role on u_role."id" = u.role_id WHERE u.user_name = 'admin' UNION SELECT u.id , u.user_name , u."password" , u.account_expired , u.account_locked , u.credentials_expired , u.enabled , u.user_info_id , au."name" as "authority_name" , au."id" as "authority_id" , us_info.first_name , us_info.last_name , us_info.gender , us_info.date_birth , us_info.phone , us_info."desc" , us_info.status , us_info.resource_id , u_role."id" as "role_id" , u_role."role" as "role" FROM user_ as u INNER JOIN users_authorities ua on u."id" = ua.user_id INNER JOIN authority au on au."id" = ua.authority_id INNER JOIN user_info us_info on us_info.id = u.user_info_id INNER JOIN user_role u_role on u_role."id" = u.role_id WHERE user_name = 'admin' ORDER BY authority_id ASC;

SELECT us_fo.id , us_fo.first_name , us_fo.last_name , us_fo.gender , us_fo.date_birth , us_fo.phone , us_fo."desc" , us_fo.status , us_fo.modify_date , us_fo.modify_by , us_fo.resource_id , (SELECT CONCAT(u.first_name,' ', u.last_name) FROM user_info u WHERE u.id = us_fo.create_by) as "create_by"
, us.id as "credential_id" , us.account_expired , us.account_locked , us.credentials_expired , us.enabled , us.user_name , us.status as "credential_status" , us.modify_by as "credential_modify_by" , us.modify_date as "credential_modify_date" , (SELECT CONCAT(u.first_name,' ', u.last_name) FROM user_info u WHERE u.id = us_fo.create_by) as "credential_create_by"
, us_r."id" as "role_id" , us_r."role" as "role_name" , us_r.status as "role_status" , us_r."desc" as "role_desc" , us_r.modify_by as "role_modify_by" ,us_r.modify_date as "role_modify_date" , (SELECT CONCAT(u.first_name,' ', u.last_name) FROM user_info u WHERE u.id = us_r.create_by) as "role_create_by"
FROM user_info us_fo LEFT JOIN user_ us on us.user_info_id = us_fo."id" INNER JOIN user_role us_r on us_r."id" = us.role_id WHERE us_fo.status != #{status};
